Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for a while, and I was wondering if a mod existed that would call out telemetry at given time intervals, for example, vehicle velocity, altitude, thrust, etc. Almost like Flight Engineer but with a voice component to it. Does this exist yet? Would this even be feasible to accomplish?

i.e. something like the audio and script used during commercial/government launches starting roughly 5 seconds prior to main engine ignition. Like this, minus the commentator. [https://youtu.be/Pl3x71-kJGM?t=1m15s](https://youtu.be/Pl3x71-kJGM?t=1m15s)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T21:12:36Z" title="03/15/2015 09:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by sumghai**
**[MOD - Moved to General Add-on Affairs, as this is the place for making requests]**

There's [Cockpit Warning Notifications](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56710-Plugin-WIP-22-Cockpit-Warning-Notifications-v0-3).

Also check out the [Kerbal Sound Overhaul Project](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55227-Kerbal-Sound-Overhaul-Project)
